Chat.base_template¶

Chat.base_template: jinja2.environment.Template = <Template 'html/Element.html.j2'>[source]¶

Base template for the element, which will be used to hold the rendered element template. Gets rendered by Element.web_widget

Chat.render_inner_html() Chat.converted_width
